item.title: Reading Time Calculator - CodeNestHQ
item.description: The Reading Time Calculator is a user-friendly tool designed to estimate the time required to read a given text based on its length and the reader's average reading speed.

item.title: Random Word Generator - CodeNestHQ
item.description: Stimulate creativity and brainstorming sessions by generating random words. Generate a random word from a predefined list

item.title: Text to Binary/Binary to Text - CodeNestHQ
item.description: Convert text to binary code and vice versa, helping in various coding and encryption tasks.

item.title: Text to Slug - CodeNestHQ
item.description: Create SEO-friendly URLs by converting text into slugs, making your links cleaner and more readable.

item.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator - CodeNestHQ
item.description: Generate placeholder text for your designs, helping you visualize how the final text will look.

item.title: HTML Encoder/Decoder - CodeNestHQ
item.description: Securely encode your HTML to prevent XSS attacks, or decode HTML to read the content easily.

item.title: URL Encoder / URL Decoder - CodeNestHQ
item.description: Prepare URLs for transmission over the internet, or decode them to read the original text.
